sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, the U.S. has welcomed Cape Town's promise to investigate allegations of arms shipments to Russia.

sentences.sentence: President Cyril Ramaphosa's office said it was disappointed by the claims and has demanded evidence. Thousands of migrants gathered at the U.S.-Mexico border on Thursday night ahead of the

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: midnight expiry of Title 42, a rule implemented by Donald Trump during the pandemic. It allowed for immediate deportations of migrants who crossed the border irregularly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Pakistan's Supreme Court has ruled the arrest of opposition leader Imran Khan illegal in a fresh twist to a political drama that unleashed a wave of violence across the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The nation's top judge said Khan's detention on Tuesday as he attended a separate hearing was contempt of court.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Khan remains Pakistan's most popular political figure, and his supporters vented their anger in several cities after his arrest, targeting government buildings and police headquarters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: At least 10 people were killed in the unrest, and many more injured, either in attacks by Khan's followers or through the actions of security forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: With the country gripped by political tension, the Supreme Court urged Khan to appeal to his supporters to remain peaceful.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: He is due to reappear on corruption charges in Islamabad's High Court on Friday. Turkish presidential candidate Muharrem Ince says he's pulling out of Sunday's presidential

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Polling at around 2%, Ince said he didn't want to be responsible for splitting the opposition vote.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: I am withdrawing from the candidate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: I am doing this for my country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The leader of the center-left Homeland Party, Ince, was one of four contenders running for president against incumbent Recep Tayyip Erdogan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Ince had faced heavy criticism for pulling crucial votes away from the six-party nation alliance that has united behind opposition leader Kamal Kilić-Doroglu. Polls have given Kilić-Doroglu a slight lead over Erdogan although neither candidate was expected to gain more than 50% of the vote and win the election outright. Now Erdogan's opponents hope NJ's withdrawal could tip the balance in their favor.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Euronews reporter Alessio Dallana was at the scene as firefighters tackled the blaze.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The explosion originated from a van.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The engine of the van caught fire and then detonated around 20 oxygen cylinders that were on the van.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: There have been several buildings and vehicles engulfed in flames. So far there's one person injured. It's the driver of the van who, according to local reports, managed to get out of the vehicle just moments before the explosion broke out. The fire has now been almost completely put out and the area is cordoned off.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Portugal is clamping down on cigarettes and vaping.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: A new bill will ban smoking in outdoor spaces next to public buildings such as schools, colleges and hospitals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It will also tighten control over the sale and marketing of cigarettes and other tobacco products in the country, with the aim that by 2025 they'll only be available for purchase in tobacconists, petrol stations and airports.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Portugal is thus complying with the European Directive of June 29, 2022, which puts heated tobacco on an equal footing with other tobacco products.
